description:
SPECIAL NOTICE!

AT THIS TIME WE ARE MOVING TO A FULLY AUTOMATED SYSTEM AND AS SUCH WILL NOT BE PROMOTING OR SUPPORTING THE SOFTWARE SHOWN HERE. PLEASE BE PATIENT. THANK YOU.

Are you interested in a second or replacement income? In this course you will become a trader in the eMini S&P 500 index futures (ES) which are the most widely traded futures instrument in the USA. You will be able to trade from any computer anywhere in the world with daily conservative monetary goals.

You will become proficient in the use of our straightforward VolumePriceTrader (VPT) software which gives you the actual trading signals for position entry, along with Bid/Ask volume analysis not found anywhere else. I provide easy to adhere to trade management rules to apply on each and every trade.

After the section on market and futures basics, I then show you how to get a free simulated account for practice and get your charts set up. You will then be able to get in your 'screen time' which is invaluable in becoming knowledgeable about how prices behave.

I then go through the full setup and usage of the software module and very quickly you will be up and running with a minimum of fuss.

At that point, you just turn your charts and the VPT module every morning and take the signals when appropriate. Most traders are done with their trading and goals in the first 2 Â½ hours of the trading session or less.

Who is the target audience?

I have had many folks see the software and would like to become involved, but they are apprehensive having never seen a financial chart, indicators, and the like. So, out of that need, this course came into being.

The first section of the course is designed for the complete beginner as I teach you everything you should know about these markets before you trade using our software. I do not labor you with the teaching of multiple indicators, chart patterns, candlesticks and the like, as the software module takes care of most of the chart analysis for you.

Experienced futures trades can immediately progress to the sections on setting up the specific charts and the VolumePriceTrader software.

All traders can take advantage of the large discounted use of the software by taking this course.

This course is not about how many lectures and hours of content I can provide. It is about getting you from today to a life of daily futures trading with the proper tools. Tools accurately designed to remove as much of the decision making and trading emotional stress as possible.

What are the requirements?

Windows based PC or laptop. 2 monitors preferred. If you don't have a dual-head video card installed, then just get a USB - VGA external adapter for under $50.

What am I going to get from this course?

  • Essentials of futures contracts
  • Use the SMI with Divergence
  • Use VPT Bid/Ask volume analysis to fine tune trades
  • Order placing to become second nature
  • Obtain free charts and data feed
  • Using the VPT ES software's automatic signals
  • Apply consistent trade management rules
  • Receive 30 days FREE VPT ES software membership
  • Ongoing software support
title: Day Trade SP 500 Futures with VolumePriceTrader Software
